delete

public void delete(List<Integer> ids)
            throws SQLException
Deletes from the database all the HistoryReferences whose id is in the list ids.

Parameters:
ids - a List containing all the ids of the HistoryReferences to be deleted
Throws:
SQLException - if an error occurred while deleting the HistoryReferences
